attributes.action: Legalise wild camping in England and Wales
attributes.additional_details: Because without the government this would not be possible and I feel as if it is important to many campers and explores across England and Wales
attributes.background: Help legalise wild camping in Wales and England to get a variety of young people and all ages into the wild for camping and having a good time

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for a similar action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703142
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715708
